analyzed: de nas de ma thag tu yi ge pam yongs su gyur pas padma dkar po'o //
translated: Then, immediately after that, a white lotus arises from the transformation of the letter paṃ.

analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge si yongs su gyur pa las seng ge dkar po'o //
translated: On top of that, the syllable si is completely transformed into a white lion.

translated: On top of that, on a moon, from the syllable hri, one should meditate on oneself as the form of the Lion of Speech, the Lord of the World, arisen from all directions.

original: dkar po phyag gnyis pa snang ba mtha' yas dang ral pa dang dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: dkar po phyag gnyis pa snang ba mtha' yas dang ral pa dang dbu rgyan can /

analyzed: spyan gsum pa dka' thub kyi cha byad 'dzin pa rgyal po chen po'i 'gying bag gis bzhugs pa /

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i skur bsgom par bya ba'o //
